climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: Your clothes will love sheets - we made this liquid free detergent sheet to soften and reduce wrinkles and eliminate stinky smells, stains, and dirt. Our high efficiency laundry detergent sheet is ideal for everyday laundry cleaning, including cottons, linens, blends, and durable synthetics. It's also safe for whites and all colors, and you can use it in hot, cold, hard, or soft water. Great for the earth.

Long lasting detergent sheet that's safe for you - our powerful concentrated laundry detergent sheet is formulated to last 3 years and is also made without harsh ingredients, making it safe for you and your clothes. Our laundry sheet is eco-friendly, plastic free with recyclable packaging, we are please to say it's septic safe and is he compatible. A tru clean

Sheets easy to use 1 sheet and go application gives you the right amount-every time. Just drop 1 sheets from our recyclable box into the washer and you're done. Uses no Dyes, or artificial brighteners. Compatible with front and top loading, high efficiency washing machine.
Dissolves completely in hot or cold water, powerful cleaning. Eco-responsible packaging, biodegradable, dye free, natural, septic safe, vegan. Momtastic Says "Mommy Must Have".

Perfect for sensitive skin - our revolutionary formula of laundry detergent sheet is made without ingredients that are the leading causes of skin irritation, making our detergent sheet perfect for kids and adults with sensitive skin and who don't want to sacrifice fresh smelling clothes. Easy for kids to use

A deeper clean - Believe it or not, even the best detergents may not altogether remove all the body soils and stains trapped deep within items in your washload. So the clothing and bedding that looks clean it may not be. Eww! That's where Sheets comes in. It's formulated to better penetrate into and between fibers to dissolve and remove body oils and others nasties you may not even be able to see.
Up to 100 loads, for those who do extra small to small loads you can use 1/2 a sheet for a full clean. Our sheets are precut and pre-measured so you can say goodbye to overused liquid.
body.description: All-Purpose Floor Cleaning Sheets Swap out those plastic jugs of liquid floor cleaner for our proprietary floor cleaning sheets. Made in the same way as our detergent sheets, you’re sure to be pleased with the cleaning ability of our floor cleaner. We’ve dehydrated highly concentrated and safe surfactants, and paired it all with lemon essential oil to cut through all the stains, grease, grime, sticky, icky, and gooey things that don’t belong on your floors. The end result? Floors that look and feel clean every time. Perfect for hardwood, laminate, concrete and all floors! Streak Free Residue Free Qty: 30 Sheets

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Safe and Effective. Our pre-measured laundry Sheets remove tough stains like grape juice, spaghetti sauce, and makeup without the mess of liquid detergents. Designed to be easy to use, they dissolve quickly and are gentle enough to use even when hand washing items.

No measuring. No Mess. Laundry sucks, we get it. Our goal was to make it suck a little less. With sheets, you don’t have to worry about heavy jugs, messy liquids, or clumpy powder. Each laundry sheet contains the fighting power of the big guys without the mess.

Get the full cleaning power you deserve! Don't be fooled by the competition. Get your money's worth. Sheets Laundry Club provides you with 50 FULL Sheets of Maximum Cleaning Power. Get a clean you can be sure about with Sheets Laundry Club. We don't ask you to tear your Sheet in half to get more loads out of your order; we give you a maximum clean that won't break the bank.

All Purpose Lemon Scented Floor Cleaner Sheets One Month Laundry Solution 50 Loads 1 Fresh Linen, 1 Lavender SB, 1 Lavender DS One Month Laundry Solution 50 Loads 1 Fresh Linen, 1 Sandbar, 1 Vitality One Month Laundry Solution 50 Loads 1 Fresh Linen,1 Uncharted Waters, 1 Vitality One Month Laundry Solution 50 Loads 1 Fresh Linen, 1 Uncharted Waters, 1 F&C DS Two Month Laundry Solution 100 Loads 2 Fresh Linen, 2 Uncharted Waters, 2 F&C DS Plastic Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ HE Compatible ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Laundry Sheet Scent Fresh Linen Fresh Linen Fresh Linen Fresh Linen Fresh Linen Dryer Sheet Scent Lavender Free & Clear (unscented) Vitality Free & Clear (unscented) Free & Clear (unscented) Scent Boosters Lavender Sea Breeze Uncharted Waters Uncharted Waters Uncharted Waters Fast Dissolve ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Gluten Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Vegan Friendly ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Zero-Waste for a Sustainable lifestyle For us, being transparent about our products and their ingredients matters. You deserve to know what’s in the products you bring into your home. We want to help you make the best choices for you and your family. Our floor cleaning sheets contain only 3 simple ingredients: Anionic Surfactants, Nonionic Surfactants, Enzymes. All-Purpose Floor Cleaning Sheets Swap out those plastic jugs of liquid floor cleaner for our proprietary floor cleaning sheets. Made in the same way as our detergent sheets, you’re sure to be pleased with the cleaning ability of our floor cleaner. We’ve dehydrated highly concentrated and safe surfactants, and paired it all with lemon essential oil to cut through all the stains, grease, grime, sticky, icky, and gooey things that don’t belong on your floors. The end result? Floors that look and feel clean every time. Perfect for hardwood, laminate, concrete and all floors! Streak Free Residue Free Qty: 30 Sheets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Recently tried out Sheets Laundry Club, and as a busy individual, I appreciate the no-fuss approach it brings to laundry. Here's my comprehensive take on it.First off, major props for being a US Veteran Owned Company – always great to support those who've served. Now, onto the product itself. The idea of detergent sheets without the plastic jug is quite innovative. It's lightweight, easy to use, and definitely helps reduce the environmental impact.The unscented nature is a plus for those with sensitivity to fragrances. The real game-changer for me is the liquid-less technology – no spills, no mess, just straightforward laundry care. The convenience of up to 100 loads in 50 sheets is pretty impressive.Considering allergies and sensitive skin, Sheets Laundry Club has proven to be a blessing. The subtle, lingering scent left on clothes is perfect, ensuring it doesn't trigger any sensitivities.Pros:- Mess-free- Gentle on sensitive skin and allergies- Convenient Subscribe and Save/Autoship option- Space saverCons:- Slightly Pricier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, no scent
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit skeptical of trying these laundry sheets, based on reading various reviews of people complaining that the sheets did not fully dissolve. I decided to try them, and I really like them. I like that the packaging is compact and easy to access, and easy to recycle. I usually tear the sheets in half and toss them into the washing machine before adding my clothes. When washing blacks, I typically use the extra rinse cycle--although I do these for those laundry pods too, to make sure that all the detergent is rinsed out of the clothing. Initially I opted to try these out on those things that I dont particularly worry if it gets destroyed--like kitchen towels and cleaning rags, but tried it on my regular clothes after liking the initial results. I have purchased a second box, and will probably transition to using these sheets as my primary laundry detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little disappointed
reviews.reviewText: I have been using these sheets for about a year with no problems, but the last box seems a little different. It still cleans well, but leaves spots of in dissolved soap on clothes sometimes. Never had this problem before. Otherwise I like them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product!
reviews.reviewText: It does the job. Easy to use, easy to store. No waste, no mess & no more giant plastic jugs of watered down detergent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised how well this works. Clothes not only looked and smelled very clean, they felt very clean. I didn't use any fabric softener at all, but in the wash or the dryer and my clothes were so very soft after being dried. I love these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product smells great super compact & lightweight
reviews.reviewText: We love how easy it is to use/open , HUGE PLUS it has an amazing sent! It smells phenomenal! 10/10 My husband could smell it across the house and it’s not overpowering and doesn’t smell fake. It cleans well and effectively

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for the environment
reviews.reviewText: This product works great to clean my clothes and takes up so much less room than conventional detergent and no plastic. I feel so much better when I can use something that performs well and is good for the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job. Very light fragrance.
reviews.reviewText: Got these as a second variety of sheet laundry detergent. I like the light fragrance and ease of use. The package takes up less space and no plastic! A win for me and the environment.
